identifier.identifierName: Contract: VA118-16-D-1008, Task Order (TO): VA-118-16-F-1008-0007, CLIN0008BA

title.value: Women's Health: Reproductive Health Order Set

description.value: The Women's Health: Reproductive Health order set shall allow users caring for women medically able to conceive to quickly and efficiently order pregnancy tests and formulary contraceptives. The order set shall present evidence-based contraceptive choices, stratified by efficacy, and shall include emergency contraception.

title.value: Laboratory Tests
If the patient is not known to be pregnant, then consider ordering a pregnancy test.

textEquivalent.value: qualitative human chorionic gonadotropin-urine now

elm:value.code: 104405006 |Urine pregnancy test, by visual color comparison methods

title.value: Medications and Devices

description.value: If the patient is not known to be pregnant, then consider ordering a pregnancy test prior to ordering any contraceptive options

title.value: Please consider the following contraception options

textEquivalent.value: Etonogestrel 68 mg implant subdermal for implantation now

elm:value.code: [71861002 |Implantation (procedure)] ->(260686004 |Method (attribute))->[257867005 |Insertion - action (qualifier value)] ->(363701004 |Direct substance (attribute))->[Rx;389221 Etonogestrel 68 MG Drug Implant]

textEquivalent.value: Copper T 380A device intrauterine for insertion now

title.value: Contraceptive Injection

textEquivalent.value: Medroxyprogesterone acetate injectable suspension 150 mg/mL. Give 1 mL solution intramuscular every 3 months, first dose now

title.value: Combined Contraceptive Vaginal Ring

textEquivalent.value: Ethinyl estradiol 0.015 mg/day/etonogestrel ethinyl 0.120 mg/day. 1 vaginal ring. Insert ring into vagina. Leave in place continuously for 3 weeks. Remove for 1 week. Then immediately replace. Dispense 1 box. 3 refills

elm:value.code: [416118004 |Administration (procedure)] ->(260686004 |Method (attribute))->[257867005 |Insertion - action (qualifier value)] ->(363701004 |Direct substance (attribute))->[Rx;1367436 21 DAY Ethinyl Estradiol 0.000625 MG/HR / Etonogestrel 0.005 MG/HR Vaginal Ring]

elm:value.value: Insert ring into vagina. Leave in place continuously for 3 weeks. Remove for 1 week. Then immediately replace. Dispense 1 box. 3 refills

title.value: Progestin-Only Contraceptive Pill

textEquivalent.value: Norethindrone 0.35 mg. Take 1 tablet oral daily 1 time. Take pills in sequence. Do not skip pills. Dispense 3 kits. 3 refills

elm:value.code: [416118004 |Administration (procedure)] ->(260686004 |Method (attribute))->[129445006 |Administration - action (qualifier value)] ->(363701004 |Direct substance (attribute))->[Rx;198042 Norethindrone 0.35 MG Oral Tablet]

elm:value.value: Take pills in sequence. Do not skip pills. Dispense 3 kits. 3 refills

title.value: Emergency Contraceptive

description.value: "1 refill now" allows the patient to take home medications for future emergency use when indicated.

textEquivalent.value: Levonorgestrel 0.75 mg tablet. Take one tablet oral every 12 hours. Take first tablet as soon as possible after and within 72 hours of unprotected intercourse. Take second tablet 12 hours after first tablet. Dispense 1 box containing 2 tablets. 1 refill now

elm:value.code: [416118004 |Administration (procedure)] ->(260686004 |Method (attribute))->[129445006 |Administration - action (qualifier value)] ->(363701004 |Direct substance (attribute))->[Rx;259218 Levonorgestrel 0.75 MG Oral Tablet]

elm:value.value: Take first tablet as soon as possible after and within 72 hours of unprotected intercourse. Take second tablet 12 hours after first tablet. Dispense 1 box containing 2 tablets. 1 refill now

textEquivalent.value: Levonorgestrel 1.5 mg tablet oral 1 time. Take as soon as possible after and within 72 hours of unprotected intercourse. Dispense 1 box containing 1 tablet. 1 refill now

elm:value.code: [416118004 |Administration (procedure)] ->(260686004 |Method (attribute))->[129445006 |Administration - action (qualifier value)] ->(363701004 |Direct substance (attribute))->[Rx;483325 Levonorgestrel 1.5 MG Oral Tablet]

elm:value.value: Take as soon as possible after and within 72 hours of unprotected intercourse. Dispense 1 box containing 1 tablet. 1 refill now

title.value: Select procedures from the following list. All procedures are priority of "now" unless otherwise specified.

textEquivalent.value: Essure permanent contraceptive device. Schedule for insertion now
Contraceptive implant implantation
Intrauterine device insertion
Diaphragm fitting
Cervical cap fitting
